name: studio
description: Barebones blog set-up with NextJS and Sanity. Integrated with Stripe in a tutorial for https://sanity.io. Read it [here](https://www.sanity.io/guides/building-ecommerce-sites-with-the-stripe-api). Comes with Sanity's inbuilt image handler
author: E.T Anderson <anderson.eric.t@gmail.com>
